snippet: Dwight Howard helped move the Lakers into the Western Conference’s final playoff spot with a victory over the Bulls, and the Heat coasted past Indiana to extend their winning streak.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Los Angeles Lakers defeat Chicago Bulls, 90-81; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard helped move the Lakers into the Western Conference’s final playoff spot with a victory over the Bulls, and the Heat coasted past Indiana to extend their winning streak.

headline.seo: Lakers Rise to 8th in West; Heat’s Winning Streak Reaches 18
headline.main: Lakers 8th in West; Heat Win 18th Straight
headline.print_headline: Lakers 8th In West; Heat Win 18th Straight
